content: seed stitch fingerless gloves these fingerless gloves are the perfect winter accessory they are done with the super simple seed stitch which is nothing more that alternating single and double crochets the seed stitch creates a nice dense fabric perfect for keeping your hands warm and cozy the wrists are extra long to keep you nice and warm here s the easy pattern wrists chain 20 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk and in each chain across chain 1 turn chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch here and throughout row 2 - 24 working back loops only single_crochet in 1st st and each st across chain 1 turn slip_stitch the two short sides together do not end off hand part round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same space as chain 1 25 more single_crochet evenly spaced around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 2 chain 1 double_crochet in same st *single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around to next to last st single_crochet in last st slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st in top of 1st double_crochet from round 2 alternate double_crochet and single_crochet around slip_stitch last double_crochet to 1st single_crochet round 4 repeat round 2 round 5 repeat round 3 round 6 repeat round 2 round 7 repeat round 3 round 8 chain 1 double_crochet in same st single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 4 times chain 3 skip 3 st *double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch to first double_crochet round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same st double_crochet in next st continue as usual until you get to the chain 3 single_crochet in each of the three chains *single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet round 10 repeat round 2 round 11 repeat round 3 round 12 repeat round 2 round 13 repeat round 3 round 14 repeat round 2 round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each of next 3 st decrease scdec over next two stitches *single_crochet in next 4 st decrease over next two stitches repeat to end join with st st break yarn thumbs round 1 join yarn anywhere in thumb hole chain 1 single_crochet in same st 8 more single_crochet evenly around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet rounds 2 and 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each of next 8 stitches slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet end off weave in ends
